name: PolyDungeon: Saving Merchant Scarlet
description:
Battle your way through zombies and orcs and save merchant Scarlet (someone with a special place in your heart and a valuable person in town).  Use your deadly sword to hack and slash foes along the way! But better watch out as there are intentional glitches in the game. Figure out glitches and use it as your advantage to reach and save Scarlet! 

Game exclusively made for WOWIE JAM 2.0 hosted by Jonas Tyroller from Jan. 17 to Jan. 19 with the theme "Intentional Bugs". Click here for the video.

Assets were reused from the original game PolyDungeon.
